Description:
We are professional, agile and our goal is to Join Runway Travel and Tourism and embark on a journey to create unforgettable travel experiences for our clients. We are a dynamic and passionate team dedicated to making dreams come true through exceptional travel and tourism services..Our work environment includes:Modern office setting
Food provided- Assist clients in planning and booking their travel arrangements.- Provide expert guidance on destinations, accommodations, and activities.- Handle reservations, ticketing, and travel documentation.- Stay up-to-date with travel trends and industry knowledge.- Ensure customer satisfaction through excellent service.Skills
